long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any website into an eye-friendly space while keeping its design intact!  

Eye Strain Relief Pro is a smart browser extension designed to reduce eye strain by intelligently adjusting the background color of websites without altering their original design or functionality.  

ğŸ§  The Most Advanced Eye Protection Available
 â€¢ Background Color Adjustment: Changes actual webpage background colorsâ€”not just overlaysâ€”for deeper comfort and better readability.  
 â€¢ Design Preservation: Maintains the original look and feel of websites, ensuring a seamless browsing experience.  
 â€¢ Smart Dark Mode Detection: Automatically recognizes and skips dark mode sites or dark sections, so you donâ€™t need to configure anything manually.  
 â€¢ Instant Previews: View adjustments in real time for a quick and accurate setup.  
 â€¢ Website Whitelisting: Exclude specific websites from being adjusted.  
 â€¢ Video Overlay Application: Dim overly bright full-screen videos for a more comfortable viewing experience.  

ğŸ¨ Personalized Comfort
 â€¢ Adjust background colors to suit your eyes, perfect for both daytime work and nighttime browsing.  
 â€¢ Fine-tune optional color overlays to tame bright elements and reduce blue light exposure.  
 â€¢ Ideal for long hours in front of the screen or for users sensitive to bright displays.  

ğŸ’¡ How to Support the Extension
Eye Strain Relief Pro is currently free to use, with all features fully accessible. If you find the extension helpful, consider supporting its development by using the "Buy Me a Coffee" option available in the settings menu.  

Why Choose Eye Strain Relief Pro?  
Stop straining your eyes with harsh white backgrounds. Whether you're working late, browsing at night, or simply want a more comfortable screen experience, Eye Strain Relief Pro offers intelligent, personalized eye protection while preserving website usability.  

Add to your browser now and enjoy the perfect balance of comfort and functionality!
